metadata.Title: CVE-2023-30775 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in the libtiff library. This security flaw causes a heap buffer overflow in extractContigSamples32bits, tiffcrop.c.

notes.Note: 0xnishit> This CVE has the same fix as CVE-2022-3570. CVE-2022-3570 has already been fixed across releases.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
